analysis: The documents are all executive orders that authorize the inspection of tax returns by various government entities, including congressional committees, federal agencies, and even the Canadian Department of National Revenue. The reasons for inspection vary, ranging from oversight of government operations to investigations of specific issues like crime, lobbying, or the administration of justice. The orders cite the legal authority for these actions, primarily sections of the Internal Revenue Code and Revenue Acts.
title: Tax Return Inspections by Government Entities
